product.title: POS Managment
product.excerpt: Owais Azam Technical Offers  Point Of Sale Inventory Management System, Retail POS Software, Manufacturing  Inventory Management System, Restaurant software, Restaurant billing software, pos management, pos inventory system, restaurant manager software, pos inventory,
product.des:
Application is Specially Designed & Developed for "Point Of Sale Management Online E-Commerce"

There are Following  Features Of This Application.

  1. Users Managment
  2. Roles & Permissions Managment
  3. Inventory & Managment
  4. Sales Managment
  5. Expense Management
  6. Custom Modules Generator
  7. Responsive & Interactive Design
  8. Reports and Analytics
  9. Mobile Responsive Deign.
  10. Chat.
  11. Advance Search Filters.
  12. Customization.
